amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the National Labor Relations Board and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 410 printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate funding for the National Labor Relations Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 250 (Roll no. 75).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 250 (Roll no. 75).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Price (GA).
